events.name: Android In Asia October Meetup
events.description: Wow, it's been a while since we last met and share about Android Best Practices. Join us this thursday at BLK71 NUS Enterprise to learn more about what's happening in the world of Android development as we inch towards the end of 2016. Agenda  6:30pm - 7:00pm - Refreshment and Social  7:00pm - 8:00pm- Intro to Android TV 7:40pm - 8:10pm - Firebase and Android. Big Thank You To Our Sponsors  Our Sponsors O'reilly   In Partnership with NUS Enterprise@Blk71  NUS Enterprise@Blk71 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent #02-01 Singapore 139951
events.location: NUS Enterprise@Blk71, 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent, #02-01, Singapore 139951

events.name: Byte Academy Kick-Off Open House: FinTech, Python, Data Science
events.description: Byte Academy, the leading FinTech, Python Fullstack Software Development and Data Science coding school headquartered in NYC, has officially opened its doors in Singapore. With its opening, Byte has transported its award-winning curriculum, star instructors and partners overseas.  Join us for an info session and open house featuring lead instructor Cody Hess, transplanted from NYC, who will launch Byte's programs. < Cody is also a star hackathon emcee and loves wearing cowboy boots >. Additionally, meet other team members, community members and ask any questions you may have about Byte Academy and/or its programs. There will also be networking so that we can get to know you in order to best deliver our programs. ** Bonus Giveaway Competition- Quantcon ** Attendees will have the chance to win tickets to Quantcon which will be held in Singapore for the first time November 10 - 12th.  Even if you are just curious about Byte, we highly encourage you to attend. Check out our NYC meetup to see more what are events are about. Interested in Byte Academy?  Let us know here -http://bit.ly/RegisterBASG About Byte Academy:  Byte Academy is a leader in industry-oriented technology education with courses in Python software development, FinTech (Financial Technology), Data Science, Blockchain and MedTech. Byte Academy established the first FinTech programme in the world and the first Python fullstack software development bootcamp in New York City, where it is headquartered. It has a second campus in Singapore. Byte Academy is recognized for its small classes, career services and sense of community. Students hail from all over the world including countries such as Australia, Chile, Finland, Siberia, and Tunisia. Byte has brought thousands together from diverse backgrounds around the globe via its hackathons, conferences, founders’ talks, meetups and other events. Byte Academy is proud to be the Education Partner for Singapore's inaugural FinTech Festival and will be holding "Byte Learning" workshops during the FinTech Conference (16 - 17 November at Singapore Expo).  Check out www.byteacademy.coto find out more.
events.location: Byte Academy Singapore Campus, 991D Alexandra Road, #01-22/23

events.name: talk.js
events.description:
Highlights 7.00pm: Doors open - mingle over pizzas 🍕 and drinks 🍹 7.30pm: Opening address by hosts 7.40pm: Start of scheduled talks 8.45pm: Open mic announcements 9.00pm: End of event 


Scheduled talks - Babel plugins: Writing code that writes code by Sebastiaan Deckers - TypeScript 101 by Andy Shu Hsin - Introduction to Vue.js by Phan An (Vue.js core team member) - Modern JavaScript with React, Redux, GraphQL, Docker by iHealth Labs Inc - You! ;) Want to give a talk? Ping us here. 


Misc If you have a short announcement you'd like to share with the audience, you may do so during open mic announcements. Remember to bring a photo ID to get through building security. Sponsor(s) Venue sponsor: PayPal Food and drink sponsor: PayPal
events.location: PayPal Singapore, Suntec Tower 5, 5 Temasek Boulevard #09-01
